gurmukhi: hr AwNks bkauly kuhwN AwXdS ] ik XzdwN bro rihnumw AwXdS ]43]
transliteration: Har Aankas Bakaule Kuraan Aayadash|| Ki Yazdaan Bado Raihnoumaa Aayadash||43||
translation: He, who puts faith on the oaths of the Quran, the Ture Lord gives him the guidance.43.

gurmukhi: n pycIdh mUey n rMjIdh qn ] ik byrUM ^ud Awvurd duSmn iSkn ]44]
transliteration: Na Pecheedah Moond Na Ranjeedah Tan|| Ki Beroon Khud Aavurad Doushman Shikan||44||
translation: There was neither any harm nor injury; my Lord, the vanquisher of the enemies, brought me to safety.44.

gurmukhi: n dwnm ik eIN mrid pYmwN iSkn ] ik daulq prsq Asqo eINmw i&kn ]45]
transliteration: Na Daanam Kieen Mard-e Paimaan Shikan|| Ki Daulat Parast Asto Eeman Fikan||45||
translation: I did not know that these oath-breakers were deceitful and flowers of mammon.45.

gurmukhi: n eImwN prsqI n Aauzwie dIN ] n swihb SnwsI n muh`md XkIN ]46]
transliteration: Na Eeman Parastina Auzaae Deen|| Na Saahib Shanaasina Muhammad Yakeen||46||
translation: They were neither men of faith, nor true followers of Islam, they did not know the Lord not had faith in the prophet.46.

gurmukhi: hrAwNks ik eImwN prsqI kund ] n pYmwN ^udS pySo psqI kund ]47]
transliteration: Haraankas Kieemaan Parastikounad|| Na Paimaan Khudash Pesho Pastikounad||47||
translation: He, who follows his faith with sincerity, he never budges an inch from his oaths.47.

gurmukhi: ik eIN mrd rw z`rh eyqbwr nysq ] ik ksmy kurwnsqu XzdwN Xkysq ]48]
transliteration: Ki Eeaa Mard Raa Zarrah Ethaar Nesat|| Ke Kasme Kuraanast(u) Yazdaan Yakesat||48||
translation: I have no faith at all in such a person for whom the oath of the Quran has no significance.48.

gurmukhi: cu ksmy kurwN sd kund ie^iqXwr ] mrw kqrh nwXd Azo eyqbwr ]49]
transliteration: Chu Kasme Kuraan Sad Kounad Ikhtiyaar|| Maraa Katrah Naayad Azo Ethaar||49||
translation: Even if you swear a hundred times in the name of the Quran, I shall not trust you any more.49.

gurmukhi: Agrich qurw eyqbwr Awmdy ] kmr bsqh ey pySvw Awmdy ]50]
transliteration: Agadchih Turaa Ethaar Aamde|| Kamar Bastah E Peshvaa Aamde||50||
translation: If you have even a little of faith in God, come in the battlefield fully armed.50.

gurmukhi: ik &rz Asq br sr qurw eIN su^n ] ik kauly ^udw Asq ksm Asq mn ]51]
transliteration: Kifarz Ast Bar Sar Turaa Eeaa Soukhan|| Ki Kaule Khoodaa Ast Kasam Ast Man||51||
translation: It is your duty act on these words, because for me, these words are like the Orders of God.51.

gurmukhi: Agr hzrqy ^ud isqwdh Svd ] bjwno idly kwr vwizh Svd ]52]
transliteration: Agad Hazrate Khud Sitaadah Shaved|| Bajaano Kile Kaar Vaazeh Shaved||52||
translation: If the Holy Prophet had been there himself, you would have acted on them with all your heart.52.

gurmukhi: Sumw rw cu &rz Asq kwry kunI ] bmUjb nivSqh Sumwry kunI ]53]
transliteration: Shoumaa Raa Chu Farz Ast Kdare Kounee|| Badoondab Navishatah Shoumdare Kounee||53||
translation: It is your duty and a binding on you to do as bidden in writing.53.

gurmukhi: nivSqh rsIdo bgu&qh zbwN ] ibbwXd ik eIN kwr rwhq rswN ]54]
transliteration: Navishatah Raseedo Bagufatah Zahaan|| Bibaayad Ko Een Kaar Raahat Rasaan||54||
translation: I have received your letter and the message, do, whatever is required to be done.54.

gurmukhi: hmUM mrd bwXd Svd su^nvr ] n iSkmy idgr dr dhwin idgr ]55]
transliteration: Hamoond Mard Baayad Shaved Soukhanavar|| Na Shikme Digad Dar Dahaane Digad||55||
translation: One should act on his words; the speech and action should correspond.55.

gurmukhi: ik kwzI mrw gu&q byhUM nXm ] Agr rwsqI ^ud ibXwrI kdm ]56]
transliteration: Ki Kaazimeraa Guft Beroon Nayam|| Agad Raasatikhud Biyaarikadam||56||
translation: I agree with the words conveyed by the Qazi, but if you promise to come on the right path.56.
